android.car.app

类 RemoteCarRootTaskView

  • java.lang.Object
    • SurfaceView
      • android.car.app.RemoteCarTaskView
        • android.car.app.RemoteCarRootTaskView

  • public final class RemoteCarRootTaskView
extends RemoteCarTaskView
    A RemoteCarRootTaskView should be used when a given list of activities are required to appear inside the bounds of a the given android.view.View in the form of a task stack. This RemoteCarTaskView creates a root task and all the given activities will launch inside that root task.

    It serves these use-cases:

    • Should be used when the apps that are meant to be in it can be started from anywhere in the system. i.e. when the host app has no control over their launching.
    • Suitable for apps like Assistant or Setup-Wizard.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getTopTaskInfo

        public ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo getTopTaskInfo()
        Returns the task info of the top task running in the root task embedded in this task view.
        返回:
        task info object of the top task.

      • isInitialized

        public boolean isInitialized()
        覆盖:
        isInitialized 在类中 RemoteCarTaskView
        返回:
        true, if the task view is initialized.

      • getTaskInfo

        public ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo getTaskInfo()
        指定者:
        getTaskInfo 在类中 RemoteCarTaskView
        返回:
        the android.app.ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo of the task currently running in the TaskView.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()

      • updateAllowListedActivities

        public void updateAllowListedActivities(java.util.List<ComponentName> list)
        Updates the list of activities that appear inside this RemoteCarRootTaskView.

        Note: If an activity is already associated with another RemoteCarRootTaskView, its designation will be overridden.

        参数:
        list - list of ComponentName of activities to be designated to this RemoteCarRootTaskView
